Plot: Police find two bodies at an old murder scene and evidence to suggest the scene's first victim's husband is a murderer. Coincidentally, the husband receives clues suggesting his deceased wife is actually alive and begins to investigate.
Title: Tell No One
Writer: Guillaume Canet, Harlan Coben (novel), Philippe Lefebvre
Actors: François Cluzet, Marie-Josée Croze, André Dussollier, Kristin Scott Thomas
tomatoConsensus: An intense, well-crafted thriller, Tell No One is equal parts heart-pounding and heart-wrenching.
